DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety effectiveness 3 strength P005672 compare placebo treatment moderate severe facial acne .
DOC.brief_title: Double-Blind , Placebo-Controlled Study Evaluate 3 Doses P005672 Treatment Facial Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: male female , 1245 year age body weight 52 88 kg diagnosis acne vulgaris : 20 50 inflammatory lesion ( papule , pustule , nodule ) 30 100 noninflammatory lesion ( open & closed comedo ) 2 nodule face Investigator 's Global Assessment ( IGA ) score moderate ( 3 ) severe ( 4 ) dermatological condition face facial hair could interfere clinical evaluation prolong QTcF ( > 450msec ) Baseline ECG pseudomembranous colitis antibioticassociated colitis hepatitis , liver damage renal impairment
